source.97033049: This broad skewness indicates the fact that a few percent of people did not respond to the survey seriously and thus did not give a lot of time... On the other hand we have those people who took the survey seriouly an thus gave alot of time but the combined effect of the two is leading the mean to fall down. so we consider 200000 as the point below which we do not cosider the respondents response as a serious one
